oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Photograph postcard of James M. Johnston in the Headquarters Company
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: This photograph postcard shows the men of the Headquarters Company in uniforms. Based on the vegetation in the background, this may have been taken at Fort Oglethorpe, Georgia. A notation on the back says James Johnston is the seventh from the left on the second row. Pvt. James McFerren Johnston served in the HQ Co., Ord. Corps, attached to the 114th MG Battn., 30th Div. The 30th Div. consisted of National Guard units from Tennessee and North and South Carolina.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Johnston, James McFerren
